content: this legal text summarizes a court case that took place in como italy in 2006 the case involved two parties referred to as re and rfrfi who coowned a piece of real estate re sued rfrfi requesting the dissolution of the coownership and division of the property re wanted the property to be divided through an auction while rfrfi wanted to keep their respective shares the courtappointed expert determined the value of the property and the court granted res request for dissolution the property will be divided through drawing lots the court rejected rfrfis counterclaim for compensation and deemed it inadmissible the court explained the legal principles and criteria for property division and concluded that drawing lots was the most appropriate method the court also addressed legal interest and monetary revaluation the courts decision will be implemented through a separate order the document is dated february 1 2006 and signed by the judge president and another individual
